AuthorName: Bnuuy Solutions & PlayStation VR2 Toolkit Contributors & ItsKruml For the CPU Fix
ModuleDescription: Provides gaze tracking data for the PlayStation VR2, With a Fix for the High CPU usage that is caused by the module provided by Bnuuy Solutions
UsageInstructions: Requires PlayStation VR2 drivers with DriverEx (from PlayStation VR2 Toolkit) installed
